task.title: Starting an instant meeting
task.shortdesc: By default, anyone with the meeting link can access an instant meeting. All instant meetings are added to the Recent tab in your Meetings homepage. Since instant meetings are not owned or moderated, any authenticated user can start an existing instant meeting.

context.p: There is a tutorial on how to create a new meeting when accessing the Meetings homepage for the first time.

p.note: By default, instant meeting names are automatically generated.

context.p: To start an instant meeting, follow these steps:

step.cmd: From the Meetings homepage, select Get Started.

Select Start an instant meeting. When you start the meeting, you are automatically redirected to the meeting room. The system generates a meeting link that you can copy and share to all intended participants.
step.info: You can access the meeting details on the Recent tab in your Meetings homepage. By default, all meetings on that list are available for 90 days. Meeting reports are not accessible for meetings removed from the list.
